title: Linux rmdir Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the rmdir command in Linux, learn how to create and delete empty directories, and remove non-empty directories using practical examples.

meta.title: Linux rmdir Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the rmdir command in Linux, learn how to create and delete empty directories, and remove non-empty directories using practical examples.
meta.keywords: Linux, rmdir, directory, file management, command line, practical examples

verify.name: Verify the rmdir command
verify.hint: Make sure you have created and removed the empty directory using the `rmdir` command correctly.

verify.name: Verify creating and deleting empty directories
verify.hint: Make sure you have created and deleted the empty directories using the `mkdir` and `rmdir` commands correctly.

verify.name: Verify removing non-empty directories
verify.hint: Make sure you have created a non-empty directory and then removed it using the `rm -r` command correctly.
